titleStmt.title: Diella certaine sonnets, adioyned to the amorous poeme of Dom Diego and Gineura. By R.L. Gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Linche, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by James Roberts] for Henry Olney, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleetstreete, neer the Middle-temple gate,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
